Gameplay Hints:

Add runes to your gems and profit from their increased value. 
But beware, each added power rune increases the risk of an explosive failure!

You can purchase new untreated dice from the store, as well as special runes to help control the outcome of the casting process.

Level up the gems in the mysterious combiner all the way up to the fabled Philosopher's stone.

Obtain the highest tier gem to win this game.

Available runes:

- Rune of Power
Each added rune of power increases the value of the gem. 
These runes are free and can be added as often as desired.

- Rune of Protection
Unless the gem carrying this rune is destroyed, one other gem is protected from failing entirely.

- Rune of Risk
If the marked gem succeeds in casting, all other gems will be granted an extra power rune.
If it fails, however, every gem gets destroyed with it.

- Rune of Exchange
If a gem with the Exchange rune succeeds, two randomly chosen gems from the cast switch their runes with each other. 
Useful if those gems have different tiers!
